title: 339 plus tax and fees ** FURNISHED ONE BEDROOMS
posting_body: Come relax in your own personal apartment, recently renovated, fully furnished suites, full-sized kitchens with appliances and all utilities included.
Emerald Suites offers the comfort of home with the flexibility you need without the hassle of a lease!
Our apartments are designed to serve you with many amenities including on-site laundry, sparkling resort-style pool, free Wi-Fi access and free cable including HBO & ESPN!
Our convenient location provides great access to the Las Vegas Convention Center, the Strip, and walking distance to shopping and restaurants.
No matter how long you need to stay, Emerald Suites has all the features you need to stay in comfort and convenience, without costing a fortune.
